titles.title: To strengthen and enhance the authority to discipline officers and employees of the Federal Government for violating the Anti-Deficiency Act, and for other purposes.
The Anti-Deficiency Reform and Enforcement Act of 2018

The Anti-Deficiency Reform and Enforcement Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by the Yeas and Nays: 14 - 11.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management
